body: I just wanted to say sorry for making recent spam threads and I also wanted to apologise for my rage and rudeness. When I play computer games I get really mad and I try to stop myself but I just get really irritated very easily. So I just wanted to apologise if I have offended you in any way. I hope you can forgive me.

title: Sorry...

replies.body: We all feel like raging sometimes, that's why you have to think before you act. It's the lesson of the day. c:
replies.body_tagged: We all feel like raging sometimes, that's why you have to think before you act. It's the lesson of the day. c:

replies.body: Thanks ^-^ But I find it really hard to resist an argument when people provoke me.
